subject_terms_3: Indian National Army (Singapore) Indian National Army Monument Site periodicals
physical_appearance: This is a clipping from the periodical publication 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly.' This page features the tricoloured flag of India of India Saffron, white and green in the center. It is titled 'The Flag of Freedom.' At the bottom of the clipping, the text reads three four-lined poems that calls for freedom of the nation. The edges of the page are slightly torn.
sgcool_label_text: "Prior to the World War II period, Indians in Singapore and Malaya retained strong political, sentimental and economic ties with their home country. Anti-colonial thoughts and actions, inspired by the ""call for freedom"" in India
title_text: The Orient Weekly The Flag of Freedom
